document.bingtitle: Name as many fast food restaurants as you can!
document.webtitle: Name as many fast food restaurants as you can!
document.description: Subway, for example, is a fast food restaurant, but I've never a Subway with a drive ... king, nathans, pizza hut, domino 's pizza, blimpie,cousins subs, dairy queen, eat ...

Name as many fast food restaurants as you can!
Regardless of wether or not you have them near you or not, how many fast food restaurants chains can you name?
In order to qulaify it should be a chain, and have a drive through to be considered fast food. Asked by dwdrums 49 months ago Similar Questions: fast food restaurants Recent Questions About: fast food restaurants Food&Drink > Restaurants Answer dwdrums's question Answers Answer from tabbycat
